details.Description: To comply with Suo Motu disclosure under the Right to Information Act, 2005, it has been decided to form a Committee to decide and finalise the content of Information Manual (section 4 1 b) for RTI on our Corporate website. Once the information manual is finalised, we have to get it audited from third party, which is mandatory as per DoPT letter vide OM No. 1/6/2011-IR dated 15.04.2013 and the audit report needs to be published along with details and URL on our Corporate Website as well as to be submitted as a part of CIC Quarterly Returns.
